original_text: Nevertheless they did flatter him with their mouth, and they lied unto him with their tongues.
korean_text: 그러나 그들이 입으로 그에게 아첨하며 자기 혀로 그에게 거짓을 말하였으니

sentences.original_text: Nevertheless they did flatter him with their mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 그럼에도 불구하고 그들은 그들의 입으로 그를 아첨하였으며

sentences.original_text: and they lied unto him with their tongues
